concept.definition: The guide is referred to by URL.
The guide is embedded in this guide when published.

description: How a dependency is represented when the guide is published.
name: GuideDependencyType

text.div:
GuideDependencyType

How a dependency is represented when the guide is published.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/guide-dependency-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
reference ReferenceThe guide is referred to by URL.
inclusion InclusionThe guide is embedded in this guide when published.
